item.title: Panel: The Future of Web Development and Content Creation
item.description: Panel discussion at Web Summit 2025 exploring the intersection of web development, content creation, and emerging technologies with four industry experts.

item.title: Conference Talk: Building Modern Podcast Sites at DevCon 2025
item.description: Conference talk at DevCon 2025 presenting a comprehensive guide to building high-performance podcast websites with Hugo and modern web technologies.
